amendment.description: To provide that none of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act may be obligated or expended at a rate higher than the level of the Senate and House of Representative concurrent budget resolution for fiscal year 2012.

action.text: Amendment SA 568 proposed by Senator Vitter.
Motion to table amendment SA 568 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 69 - 30. Record Vote Number: 113.
